meanings: [명사] siege, [동사] besiege, surround, hem in, lay siege to

vlive.korean: 포위 저작이 있는? That has "surrounded writing"? 듣기 View video Hwang Chi Yeul : #2019 #밤황치열시 #part.13 #DJ황치열
풍선이 나를 포위했어. The balloon has besieged me. 듣기 View video NCT : 어린이💚어른이💚모여라
일본군들이 포위를 하고 있고. Japanese soldiers have him surrounded. 듣기 View video 10PM : 목요일 김태훈, 정시우의 무비톡톡! Movie talk!talk!
[카메라에 포위된 갓 민간인들...] - 애들 언제 와? - 형. [Civilians surrounded by cameras...] - When are they coming? - Hyung. 듣기 View video 슈주 리턴즈 : 슈주 리턴즈 EP6- 슈퍼주니어 새 앨범 첫 회의
vlive.english: [Civilians surrounded by cameras...] - When are they coming? - Hyung.

vlive.korean: 이 장면은 말하자면 갇힌 건데, 포위된 건데... 납득을 못 하겠어요. But in this movie, he was trapped. I can't understand why. 듣기 View video 10PM : 목요일 김태훈, 정시우의 무비톡톡! Movie talk!talk!
vlive.english: But in this movie, he was trapped. I can't understand why.

examples.korean: The town capitulated after a three-week siege. 발음듣기 그 소도시는 3주간의 포위 공격 후 항복했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The town capitulated after a three-week siege. 발음

examples.korean: The siege was finally lifted after six months. 발음듣기 그 포위는 6개월 후에 마침내 풀렸다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The siege was finally lifted after six months. 발음

examples.korean: an attempt to break the year-long siege 발음듣기 일 년간 계속되어 온 포위를 끝장내려는 시도 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: an attempt to break the year-long siege 발음

examples.korean: The town succumbed after a short siege. 발음듣기 그 소도시는 짧은 포위 공격 후에 무릎을 꿇었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The town succumbed after a short siege. 발음

examples.korean: They had withstood siege, hunger and deprivation. 발음듣기 그들은 포위 공격, 굶주림, 빈곤을 견뎌 냈었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: They had withstood siege, hunger and deprivation. 발음
